scripts.build:adhoc-dmg: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; npm run tauri build -- --bundles app; APP="src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos/KnotenWerk.app"; if [ ! -d "$APP" ]; then echo "App not found at $APP"; exit 1; fi; if [ -f "scripts/bundle-macos-dylibs.mjs" ]; then node scripts/bundle-macos-dylibs.mjs "$APP"; else echo "Skipping dylib bundling (scripts/bundle-macos-dylibs.mjs not found)"; fi; codesign --force --deep --sign - "$APP"; codesign --verify --deep --strict --verbose=2 "$APP"; mkdir -p src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg; VERSION=$(node -p "const c=require(\"./src-tauri/tauri.conf.json\"); c.version || (c.package && c.package.version) || \"0.0.0\""); ARCH=$(uname -m); OUT="src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg/KnotenWerk_${VERSION}_${ARCH}_adhoc.dmg"; hdiutil create -volname "KnotenWerk" -srcfolder "$APP" -ov -format UDZO "$OUT"; echo "Created $OUT";'
